definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Namibia is one of the most sparsely populated countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 納米比亞是世界上人口最稀少的國家之一。

sentences.english: The white sulfur reflects light, tinting the water bright green along the Namibian coast.
sentences.chinese: 白色硫磺反光，將納米比亞沿岸的水着成碧綠色。

sentences.english: THE mother of former President Sam Nujoma, Kuku Helvi-Mpingana Kondombombolo, has died at the age of 108.
sentences.chinese: 納米比亞前總統努喬馬的母親辭世，享年108歲。

sentences.english: BBC One filmed them in Gobabeb, Namibia.
sentences.chinese: BBC一臺在納米比亞的gobabeb完成拍攝。

sentences.english: Nara melon, is a staple of Namib species at every rung of the food chain.
sentences.chinese: 它的瓜果餵養了納米比亞境內食物鏈上的各種動物。

sentences.english: Thewhite sulfur reflects light, tinting the water bright green along theNamibian coast.
sentences.chinese: 白色硫磺反光，將納米比亞沿岸的水着成碧綠色。

sentences.english: The new Namibian flag was hoisted up the flagpole.
sentences.chinese: 納米比亞的新國旗升到了旗杆頂上。

sentences.english: The successful relocation of these two cheetahs represents a trend in Namibia.
sentences.chinese: 這兩隻獵豹的成功轉移代表着納米比亞的一種趨勢。

sentences.english: At the invitation of the Namibian Foreign Ministry, Zhai arrived in Namibia on August 23 for a visit.
sentences.chinese: 應納米比亞外交部邀請，翟雋於23日抵納訪問。

sentences.english: Wind frequently pushes dust plumes seaward along the Namibian Coast.
sentences.chinese: 大風頻繁的沿着納米比亞海岸把沙塵吹向大海方向。

definition: Emirate/Sheikdom/used as translation for country under a chief
East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: (agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
